JobTitle: Technical Program Manager (Sr Consultant) - Remote US

For products/solutions in development, the Program Manager leads a core team through definition/requirements, planning, development, and launch. For shipping products/solutions, the Program Manager leads a sustaining core team to manage feature enhancements, quality, continuity of supply, etc.The Program Manager leads the execution of the Offer Lifecycle Process (OLP).
